com.itmatcher.domain

Class Language

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.itmatcher.domain.WeightedCriteria
      • com.itmatcher.domain.Language

  • public class Language
extends WeightedCriteria
    Language Class - represents a language for use in job requirements

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Language(java.lang.String value)
      Creates a language without weighting
      Language(java.lang.String value, CriteriaWeight weight)
      Creates a language with the specified value and weight

      • Language

        public Language(java.lang.String value,
                CriteriaWeight weight)
        Creates a language with the specified value and weight
        Parameters:
        value - a string containing the name of the language
        weight - a CriteriaWeight instance that contains the weighting of the language for a job
